The follow up to 2011Ã¢â‚¬â„¢s Billy Jack (named one of the top albums of the year by American Songwriter), Ã¢â‚¬Å“3Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ finds lead singer/banjo player/violinist Suzanne Santo and vocalist/guitarist Ben Jaffe twisting their gritty, harmony-driven brand of Southern-flavored rock & roll through tales of lost souls, broken boys, and girls with gold in their spit.
